page.title: 07Customs & Ghost Stories 3
page.content: Every year the{fair}comes for a few days and then moves on. Each year Tenbury has a {Carnival.}People dress up beautifully in costumes and decorate big lorries called "floats".We also have a beauty contest and the person who wins is called the "Carnival Queen".We also have lots of stalls and a mini fair. { "Castle Tump"}is said to be where Caractacus is buried. Every year Tenbury has a{show. {People}bring along their best vegetables they have grown and they win prizes. People also have prizes for best cakes and marmalade etc. Also people bring along their best farm animals in a competition and there is a{gymkhana.
